message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,200.  I believe this product is truly valuable and will be a great investment for you at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my assessment, I am able to commit to a price of $9,100 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
